RestartExplorerButtonDescription: Some interface settings may require you to restart explorer.exe
BootConfigAppearanceDescription: Everything related to the appearance of booting Windows
NvidiaDisplayContainerSubMenuDescription: Everything related to the NVIDIA Display Container
StartMenuSubMenuDescription: Everything related to customizing the Windows Start Menu
ContextMenuSubMenuDescription: Everything related to the context menu
AiSubMenuDescription: Everything related to AI features in Windows 11
ServicesSubMenuDescription: Everything related to services in Windows
BootConfigurationSubMenuDescription: Everything related to booting in Windows
FileExplorerSubMenuDescription: Everything related to customizing the Windows File Explorer
FileSharingSubMenuDescription: Everything related to file sharing in Windows
ContextMenuTerminals: Add or remove terminals from the context menu
ExtractContextMenuDescription: Adds an "Extract" option in the context menu for compressed files
RunWithPriority: Run With Priority in context menu
RunWithPriorityDescription: Adds a "Run With Priority" option in the context menu for applications
LanmanWorkstationDescription: Enable or disable the Lanman Workstation service for SMB file sharing
NetworkDiscoveryDescription: Enable or disable network discovery for easier file sharing
NvidiaDispayContainerDescription: Enable or disable the NVIDIA Display Container service
AddNvidiaDisplayContainerContextMenu: NVIDIA Display Container in context menu
AddNvidiaDisplayContainerContextMenuDesc: Adds a NVIDIA Display Container toggle in the context menu
CpuIdleContextMenu: CPU Idle toggle in context menu
CpuIdleContextMenuDescription: Adds a CPU Idle toggle in the context menu
LockScreenDescription: Enable or disable the Windows lock screen
ShortcutTextDescription: Show or hide the "Shortcut" text on shortcuts
BootLogoDescription: Enable or disable the Windows boot logo
BootMessagesDescription: Enable or disable Windows boot messages
NewBootMenuDescription: Enable or disable the new Windows boot menu
SpinningAnimationDescription: Enable or disable the spinning animation on boot
AdvancedBootOptionsDescription: Enable or disable advanced boot options on startup
AutomaticRepairDescription: Enable or disable automatic repair on boot failure
KernelParametersDescription: Enable or disable kernel parameters on startup
HighestModeDescription: Enable or disable highest mode for displays
CompactViewDescription: Enable or disable compact view in File Explorer
RemovableDrivesInSidebarDescription: Show or hide removable drives in the File Explorer sidebar
FsoAndGameBarDescription: Enable or disable Fullscreen Optimizations and Game Bar
PhoneLinkDescription: Enable or disable phone link and mobile devices
PowerSavingDescription: Enable or disable power saving features
WebSearchDescription: Enable or disable web search in the Start Menu
WindowsSpotlightDescription: Enable or disable Windows Spotlight on the lock screen
AppStoreArchivingDescription: Enable or disable Microsoft Store archiving
TakeOwnership: Add "Take Ownership" in the context menu
TakeOwnershipDescription: Adds a "Take Ownership" option in the context menu for files and folders
OldContextMenuDescription: Enable or disable the legacy context menu from pre-Windows 11
EdgeSwipeDescription: Enable or disable edge swipe gestures
AppIconsThumbnailDescription: Show or hide app icons on file thumbnails
AutomaticFolderDiscoveryDescription: Enable or disable automatic folder discovery in File Explorer
GalleryDescription: Enable or disable the gallery in File Explorer
SnapLayoutDescription: Enable or disable snap layouts for windows
RecentItems: Unlocks recent items on file explorer
RecentItemsDescription: Enable or disable recent items on file explorer
VerboseStatusMessageDescription: Enable or disable verbose status messages during boot and shutdown
StaticIpDescription: Automatically configures a static IP address for your network adapter
HideAppBrowserControlDescription: Show/Hides the embedded browser control in Windows Security
SecurityHealthTray: Security Health button in the task bar tray
SecurityHealthTrayDescription: Show or hide the Security Health button in the task bar tray
FaultTolerantHeapDescription: Enable or disable the Fault Tolerant Heap mitigation
CopilotDescription: Enable or disable Microsoft Copilot integration in Windows 11
RecallDescription: Enable or disable Windows Recall feature
CpuIdleDescription: Enable or disable CPU idling feature
ProcessExplorerDescription: Install Process Explorer from Microsoft Sysinternals
VbsStateDescription: Enable or disable Virtualization Based Security (VBS)
GiveAccessToMenuDescription: Adds a 'Give access to' option in the context menu for files and folders
NetworkNavigationPaneDescription: Show or hide the network navigation pane in File Explorer
FileSharingDescription: Enable or disable file sharing features
WindowsHelloDescription: Enable or disable Windows Hello biometric authentication
